description: This file defines a UI component called 'Button' using the LightningJS framework's Blits component class. It includes a template for rendering and manages internal state related to a favorited status, toggled by user input.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a button with toggleable favorite status.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the Enter key input to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
